verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I have a home
Eternal home
But for now I walk this broken world

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You walked it first
You know our pain
But You show hope can rise again up from the grave

verse.name: v3

Abide with me
Don't let me fall
And don't let go

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:

And never leave
Ever close God abide with me
